website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for teams and leagues with a fun color assortment, these balls are true to size and offer plenty of coverage for individuals over six ft. tall.
pros: These bubble balls come in 4 and 5 foot sizes to fit kids and adults alike
The nylon strap system with metal O-rings is secure and easy to adjust
Reinforced plug for easy, consistent inflation
cons: Occasional reports of micro-tears or tiny holes upon arrival that are discovered when attempting to inflate

customer_reviews.title: Safety and much FUN !
customer_reviews.text: I was worried of the safety of the balls but it proved not to be a problem after using several times. Totall fun for roll or running into each other.
customer_reviews.author: Newman Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Bumper balls, baby oil, no clothing, fun times!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these Ancheer bumper balls with the sole purpose of getting my wife naked in them. Little did I know, I had more fun just knocking her over on her keister than actually turning up the heat on our kink. So interested in taking out some frustration on a significant other without all the bruises? Buy them. Pesky kids that whine and complain all the time and need bounced around? Buy them. A couple of kinky freaks that want to oil yourselves up and have some bouncy foreplay? Buy them. Worth every penny. Disclaimer: Ancheer or Amazon does not openly condone domestic violence or violence towards kids, but in their sick twisted minds........
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Enjoyable - good exercise
customer_reviews.text: These are plenty fun and enjoyable for almost all ages. But be careful if you are claustrophobic. You won't like being in one of these if you tend to get nervous in tight spaces. Also, it's hot in there in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Deena H. Lynk

customer_reviews.title: Hole first day used.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these and one either came with a small hole, leak in it or developed one in first use. They came with no patches or anyway to fix/repair
customer_reviews.author: J Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Ordered 8 for my dad 5 years ago. They have held up well overtime and even with 200lb + men going all out. Just ordered 6 more for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon arrival and no help from seller
customer_reviews.text: We opened it up and inflated it right away. It would not hold the air and kept deflating. I contacted the seller and they wanted me to soak the whole thing in water to find the hole. I’m sorry, but it if costs over $100 for this.. it should come in working condition. They were not helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used for our youth group at church. Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Elliott

customer_reviews.title: So Much FUN
customer_reviews.text: We took this to the lake over Memorial Weekend and the kids had a blast. Not the greatest to store, but otherwise, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for adults
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for teens and adults..Not for use by kids.
customer_reviews.author: Joan cuthbert

customer_reviews.title: Much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 for Christmas gifts for our grandchildren and they really like it.Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: mike cornellier

product_meta.title: ANCHEER Inflatable Bumper Bubble Soccer Ball Dia 4ft/5 ft(1.2m/1.5m) Giant Human Hamster Ball for Adults and Teens
feature_bullets: 【Durable Material】Ancheer Knocker ball is made of 0.8MM PVC, non-toxic and odorless healthy material, 7 fasteners a row, better sealed for long-term use. UL GREENGUARD approved.
【Safe Balls】Bubble ball has 2 handles and 2 adjustable shoulder straps make it more safe and easier to play, non-deformation in summer or winter.
【Easy to Inflate or Deflate】The bumper zorb ball can inflate or deflate with electric air pump (not included) in 1-2 minutes.
【Specification】Zorb Ball Diameter: 5 ft/ 4 ft, Suitable Player Height: 3’9’’-6'2'', Suitable Player Weight: 60-200 lbs (ages 8+).

【Various Games】Widely used in backyard, playing center, amusement park where is away from sharp objects. You can enjoy the freedom to bounce, flip, roll over and bump, while playing games like Bubble Soccer, Bull rush and Last One Standing. Watch Video clip: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ncdvizkN8A
